column1: Little Goat Diner////This place is excellent-everything we had was fresh
column4: the food.....start with a Little Goat or if you want a cocktail
column5: The Fizz is fresh and refreshing!  I ordered the trout my husband ordered shrimp and grits-both amazing choices!  Make sure to take home some bread or baked goods from the bakery...we've tried 5 different types of bread and they are all unique and flavorful.  I don't think you can make any bad choices at this place to be honest!
